description:
Manwich Sloppy Joe Sauce is naturally thick and made with vine-ripened tomatoes, sweet onions, bell peppers and a special blend of spices and seasonings.

Directions
Easy as: 1. Brown 1 lb lean ground beef (or 3/4 lb ground turkey) in large skillet until no longer pink; drain. 2. Stir in 1 can Manwich; heat through. 3. Serve on hamburger buns. Out of hamburger buns? Serve on hot dog buns, toasted bread, bagels, biscuits or English muffins. Also tastes great over pasta, rice, or baked potato.

description:
Soy Vay Veri Veri Teriyaki Marinade & Sauce is bursting with distinct Asian flavor accents. This marinade and sauce is made from high quality ingredients including soy sauce, expeller pressed sesame oil, ginger, garlic, onion and toasted sesame seeds. This preservative-free sauce contains no high-fructose corn syrup. Try it as a marinade or dip for chicken, fish, pork or beef, or use it to whip up an easy sauce for quick dinners. It also tastes great as a savory sauce to liven up any meat, fish, tofu or vegetables. Whether you are grilling, baking, broiling or stir frying, with Soy Vay, the meal ideas are endless and the taste is great.


Usage Directions: Shake well before using. Use as a marinade or dip or add during or after cooking. Refrigerate after opening.

Ingredients: Soy sauce (water, wheat, soybeans, salt), sugar, expeller pressed vegetable oil (soybean and/or canola), dried onion, sesame seeds, dried garlic, ginger puree (ginger, water), expeller pressed sesame oil, dried ginger.

Warnings: Contains wheat and soy. Product formulations, packaging and promotions may change. For the most current information refer to product packaging.
title: Soy Vay Marinade & Sauce Veri Veri Teriyaki 21 oz

bullets: One 21 ounce bottle of Soy Vay Marinade & Sauce, Veri Veri Teriyaki
Use as a marinade for chicken, fish, pork or beef
Serve as a dipping sauce for a variety of meals
soft_bullets.title: highlights

description:
Same premium quality since 1835. The original. All natural. Unwrap the flavor. Since 1835, Lea & Perrins has been the one truly authentic brand of worcestershire sauce. Lea & Perrins combines the finest ingredients sourced from around the world and ages them in perfection to produce a flavor unmatched for over 175 years. The Famous Paper Wrap: In 1837, Lea & Perrins first began exporting worcestershire sauce around the world by boat. The lengthy and often rough sea voyages caused some of the bottles to break. The practice of wrapping each bottle in a paper wrap was devised to protect the bottles and prevent damage during transit. Although no longer technically necessary, the custom has endured, and the paper wrap has come to symbolize the rich heritage and premium quality of Lea & Perrins, a tradition dating back to 1835. Cholesterol free. Fat free. Gluten-free. No preservatives. 80% less sodium than soy sauce (Lea & Perrins Worcestershire Sauce contains 65 mg of sodium per 1 tsp. serving. The top national brand of regular soy sauce contains 310 mg of sodium per 1 tsp).

Directions
Best if used by date on bottle. Shake the bottle.
title: Lea & Perrins® Original Worcestershire Sauce - 10oz

Fish. Indoor oven, outdoor grill! Cooking sauce for easy oven barbecuing and charcoal broiling. Excellent for seasoning, soups, gravies, sauces, baked beans, salads, dips, oysters, eggs, fish, poultry or wherever smoke flavor is 1869 - First Smokehouse Built in Mexia, TX: Colgin is the all-natural liquid smoke with no additives or preservatives. Colgin is vegan, contains no animal by-products and is gluten free. Colgin is the instant answer for adding smoke flavor to almost any food that would benefit from real smoke flavor and aroma. Create a gourmet flavored dish with just a few shakes! Old smokehouse flavor in a bottle. An all-natural mesquite smoke flavor enhancer for any type of food.

Directions
Shake well before each use.
title: Colgin All Natural Hickory Liquid Smoke - 4oz

bullets: All-Natural Liquid Smoke with No Additives or Preservatitives
soft_bullets.title: highlights

description:
Directions:
Mesquite Marinade: 1/4 cup oil; 1/4 cup water; 2 lbs. chicken, pork or beef. 1. Mix marinade mix, oil and water in small bowl. Reserve 2 tbsp. marinade for basting. Place meat in large resealable plastic bag or glass dish. Add remaining marinade; turn to coat well. 2. Refrigerate 15 minutes, or longer for extra flavor. Remove meat from marinade. Discard any remaining marinade. 3. Grill, broil or bake until desired doneness, basting with reserved marinade halfway through cooking. Discard any remaining marinade. Makes 1/2 cup marinade. Suggestion: Mesquite BBQ Sauce: Combine marinade mix with 1/2 cup ketchup and 1/3 cup honey. Brush sauce on meat last 10 min. of cooking.
title: McCormick Grill Mates Mesquite Marinade 1.06 oz

description:
Directions:
Add 4 parts broth (or water) to 1 part paste. Use Low heat; stirring constantly and bring to boil (above 210 degrees F). Keep the sauce in Low heat for 4 minutes and serve warm over chicken or other foods. Refrigerate after opening. Keep in a cool and dry place.
title: Dona Maria Mole Sauce 8.25 oz

description:
Directions:
Zesty Herb Marinade: 1/3 cup water; 3 tbsp. vegetable oil; 3 tbsp. white vinegar; 2 lbs. pork, chicken or beef. 1. Combine marinade mix with water, oil and vinegar in glass dish or large plastic bag. 2. Add meat, turning to coat all sides. Marinate in refrigerator 15 min., or longer for extra flavor. 3. Grill, broil or bake until done, basting with remaining marinade halfway through cooking, if desired. Discard any leftover marinade. Makes 2/3 cup marinade. Suggestion: Zesty Herb Marinade: Also compliments the flavor of grilled vegetables.
title: McCormick Grill Mates Zesty Herb Marinade 1.06-oz.

description:
With garlic & cracked black pepper. No MSG. Natural flavors. Naturally tenderizes. Lawry's unites the zesty flavors of garlic and black pepper with mustard, caraway seed and a splash of lemon juice to create this versatile marinade for your family to enjoy. It brings wonderful flavor to beef and pork. Also use to marinate chicken! Check out Lawry's website for recipes & tips. Packed in USA.

Directions
Shake well. Refrigerate after opening. For best results, pour marinade over beef, pork or chicken. Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes - longer for fuller flavor. Grill, broil or bake. Brush on additional marinade during cooking for extra flavor. Discard excess used marinade; do not reuse. Best by: Date below.
title: Lawry's Original Steak & Chop Marinade - 12oz

description:
Soy Vay Spicy Korean BBQ Simmer Sauce is a quick and simple spicy simmer sauce that can be used to prepare a stovetop meal in 10 minutes or used in a slow cooker. It is made with red peppers to heat it up and a mixture of garlic, ginger, soy sauce and sesame oil to spice it up. This no preservatives, Korean-inspired bulgogi simmer sauce has a sweet savory flavor that is not overly spicy. It is perfect for a quick and easy delicious skillet meal with an Asian flare. Try it with different types of meats like pork, chicken or beef. Dress up your meal with Soy Vay Simmer Sauces.

Usage Directions: To cook over the stove top, simply cook 2lbs. of tender cubes of beef or your preferred meat in an oiled skillet until seared. Add sauce and reduce heat to low, stirring often until meat is fully cooked and sauce reaches desired thickness. To prepare in a slow cooker, pour sauce over a 2 lb. round or chuck roast, cover and cook on low for 7 hours.

Caution Statements: Contains wheat and soy. Product formulations, packaging and promotions may change. For the most current information refer to product packaging.
title: Soy Vay® Simmer Sauce Spicy Korean BBQ 8 oz

bullets: Soy Vay Spicy Korean BBQ Simmer Sauce
Made with red peppers, garlic, ginger, soy sauce and sesame oil

Directions
Marinade beef, chicken, steak, pork, fish, turkey, wild game, or vegetables for only 1/2 hour for best results. Moore's can do more in 30 minutes than other marinades can do all night. Use 1/2 cup for each pound of meat. Shake well before using. Refrigerate after opening.
